comment: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number results in the word itself, the shift must be either by 0 (modulo the length of the word) or the word must be a "repeated symbol word". (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)
